text: Julio Anguita González (21 November 194116 May 2020) was a Spanish Communist politician. He was born in Fuengirola, Spain. Anguita was Secretary General of the Communist Party from 1988 to 1998. He was also Mayor of Córdoba from 1979 to 1986. From 1989 to 2000, he was a Congressional Deputy and Coordinator of United Left. Anguita died on 16 May 2020 in Córdoba of a heart attack, aged 78.Muere Julio Anguita, histórico líder de Izquierda Unida, a los 78 años ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish mayors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Julio Anguita
